name: Sarthak Pratik
about: An entrepreneur at heart who is passionate about finance, technologies, products & startups. He believes that aesthetic expression shouldn't be without substance, and he derives energy from building beautiful products that create value. He is a startup enthusiast who loves interacting with zealous entrepreneurs. An avid learner looking forward to seeking and imparting knowledge.
